attributes.action: force Roly Keating, BBC2 Controller, to broadcast the 2nd series of Torchwood in 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Torchwood is a life affirming television programme about 5 people struggling to save Cardiff, the world and themselves from the horrors of a rift in time.
4 million viewers a week were transfixed by the complex situations the characters      found themselves in.
Originally broadcast on BBC3 the success of the programme was such that BBC2 'acquired' the 1st broadcast rights and has subsequently scheduled the 2nd series for 2008.
The delay in broadcasting has shocked & dismayed it's loyal audience (affectionately known as woodies).

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
